content: by ursula wood page 5 of 6 the border row 47 * form bobble ch3 skip 2sts single_crochet in next st repeat from * until 1st remain form bobble ch3 single_crochet in last st bind off work in the end tail with a yarn/wool needle the end of the pattern see below for more pictures and my contact details photo above the blue shawl was done in red heart rainbow shawl in a ball cotton/acrylic blend 570m 150g using 4mm crochet hook size 21 x 60 inches excluding bobbles photo above i used 645m 220g of double knit acrylic 4 5mm crochet hook for more drape size 24 x 62 inches excluding bobbles count my blessings shawl by ursula wood page 6 of 6 contact me via email for any questions omgrannysquare@gmail com or contact me via facebook messenger https //www facebook com/groups/1605796789579600 the end
